tier1_externally_derived.name: four_factors_weights
tier1_externally_derived.derivation: Oliver 2004, Kubatko 2007 — published D1 regression coefficients

tier1_externally_derived.name: hca_points
tier1_externally_derived.derivation: Meta-analysis consensus: college basketball HCA is 3.5-4.0 points

tier1_externally_derived.name: elo_hca_multiplier
tier1_externally_derived.derivation: FiveThirtyEight Elo methodology — published conversion factor

tier1_externally_derived.name: seed_prior_slope
tier1_externally_derived.derivation: Logistic fit on 40 years of public tournament data (1985-2024, N>2500)

tier1_externally_derived.name: pre_calibration_clips
tier1_externally_derived.derivation: Historical 1-vs-16 upset rate ~1.5%; 3% provides safety margin

tier1_externally_derived.name: log5_scale
tier1_externally_derived.derivation: D1 fix: analytically derived k=ln(17/3)/10=0.1735 so AdjEM=+10 maps to exactly 0.850 win%. Prior value 0.145 gave 0.810, not 0.85 as documented.

tier1_externally_derived.name: elo_dampening_numerator
tier1_externally_derived.derivation: FiveThirtyEight published Elo methodology dampening constant

tier1_externally_derived.name: elo_dampening_denom_scale
tier1_externally_derived.derivation: FiveThirtyEight published Elo methodology elo_diff scaling

tier1_externally_derived.name: ts_pct_fta_weight
tier1_externally_derived.config_path: ProprietaryMetrics (0.44 * FTA in True Shooting denominator)

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: training_year_decay
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: Bounded (0,1), monotonically decreasing importance of older data

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: training_year_min_weight
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: Floor > 0 prevents discarding old data entirely

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: recency_half_life
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: Within-season temporal weighting; bounded, monotone effect

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: recency_decay_floor
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: Floor prevents discarding early-season games

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: late_season_cutoff_days
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: Bounded, monotone effect on sample size vs feature quality

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: round_correlation_decay
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: Must be monotonically decreasing R64→Championship; tournament structure

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: lgb_num_leaves
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: Lower = more regularized; conservative for small N (~400 samples)

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: lgb_min_child_samples
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: Higher = more regularized; ~12% of training data

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: xgb_max_depth
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: Lower = more regularized; standard shallow-tree choice

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: xgb_min_child_weight
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: Higher = more regularized

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: elo_season_regression
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: D2 fix: 25% regression toward mean (1500) at each season boundary. Matches FiveThirtyEight NFL Elo methodology (Silver, 2014). Reduces cold-start noise in early-season ratings.

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: elo_k_base
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: MOV-adjusted Elo K-factor; bounded, monotone effect on update magnitude

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: wab_k
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: log5 scaling denominator for WAB; bounded, controls sensitivity to AdjEM gap

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: bubble_em_prior
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: Historical average AdjEM of ~45th-ranked team; Bayesian prior for WAB

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: margin_cap
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: Blowout cap; bounded, prevents extreme margins from distorting efficiency

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: sos_damping
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: SOS convergence blend factor; bounded (0,1), higher = faster convergence

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: three_pt_prior_weight
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: Bayesian 3PT shrinkage prior strength; ~3 games of 3PA volume

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: three_pt_league_avg
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: D1 average 3PT%; slowly drifts year-to-year but structurally bounded

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: pit_noise_base
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: PIT residual noise scale; bounded, proportional to season_remaining

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: pit_stability_scaling
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: How much feature stability reduces PIT noise; bounded [0,1]

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: pit_feature_noise_reduction
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: Noise reduction multiplier for PIT-adjusted features; bounded (0,1)

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: mean_regression_shrinkage
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: Regression toward league mean; bounded, monotone effect

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: pit_weight_cap
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: Maximum PIT blend weight; bounded, caps PIT override of end-of-season

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: sos_iterations
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: Convergence iterations for additive SOS; bounded, monotone convergence

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: luck_min_games
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: Minimum games for luck metric; data quality threshold

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: luck_full_weight_games
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: Games at which luck shrinkage = 100%; structural ramp

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: momentum_window
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: Rolling game window for momentum calculation; bounded

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: four_factors_composite_scale
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: Converts Four Factors composite to PPP-like units; structural scaling

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: mc_final_clip_lo
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: Post-noise probability floor in MC simulation; prevents log(0)

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: mc_final_clip_hi
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: Post-noise probability ceiling in MC simulation; structural bound

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: seed_interaction_scale
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: Normalization denominator for seed interaction feature; structural

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: gnn_target_scale
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: AdjEM normalization for GNN training targets; scale parameter

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: early_stopping_rounds
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: Early stopping rounds; structural regularization, bounded

tier2_structurally_constrained.name: optuna_n_trials
tier2_structurally_constrained.derivation: Max Optuna tuning trials; bounded, more trials = more selection bias

tier3_freely_tuned.name: ensemble_lgb_weight
tier3_freely_tuned.derivation: Calibrated from LOYO; 2 free DoF (3 weights sum to 1)

tier3_freely_tuned.name: ensemble_xgb_weight
tier3_freely_tuned.derivation: Calibrated from LOYO; coupled with lgb weight

tier3_freely_tuned.name: tournament_shrinkage
tier3_freely_tuned.derivation: Calibrated from LOYO — comment says so explicitly

tier3_freely_tuned.name: consistency_normalizer
tier3_freely_tuned.derivation: Paired with consistency_bonus_max; normalizes variance range

tier3_freely_tuned.name: mc_regional_correlation
tier3_freely_tuned.derivation: Reduced from 0.25 during OOS fix round

tier3_freely_tuned.name: mc_injury_severity_lo
tier3_freely_tuned.derivation: Lower bound of injury severity logit shift; iteratively set

tier3_freely_tuned.name: mc_injury_severity_hi
tier3_freely_tuned.derivation: Upper bound of injury severity logit shift; iteratively set

tier3_freely_tuned.name: mc_lognormal_sigma
tier3_freely_tuned.derivation: Cross-region (Final Four) noise lognormal sigma; iteratively set

tier3_freely_tuned.name: mc_region_noise_floor
tier3_freely_tuned.derivation: Floor for regional noise multiplier; prevents zero-variance regions
